title: Chamfer Dimension
description: Defines angle for the chamfer dimension

edge1Start.description: Start of the first edge for the chamfer dimension

edge1End.description: End of the first edge for the chamfer dimension

edge2Start.description: Start of the second edge for the chamfer dimension

edge2End.description: End of the second edge for the chamfer dimension

textPosition.description: Midpoint for the dimension text, non-associative

firstChamferOverride.description: Override to replace the first value of chamfer dimension

secondChamferOverride.description: Override to replace the second value of chamfer dimension

formatting.description: Dimension formatting override for this dimension

measurementLength.description: Returns the measurement length (DXF 42) stored in this dimension entity

measurementAngle.description: Returns the measurement angle (DXF 42) stored in this dimension entity

displayedValue.description: Returns the displayed value of the dimension entity

firstLengthValuePrecision.description: First length value precision for Chamfer

secondLengthValuePrecision.description: Second length value precision for Chamfer

isFirstLengthPrecisionOverridden.description: True if the first length value precision is overridden.

isSecondLengthPrecisionOverridden.description: True if the second length value precision is overridden.

isAnglePrecisionOverridden.description: True if the angle precision is overridden.

unit.description: Unit for the measurement, by default it is drawings unit enum value DRAWING.

secondUnit.description: Unit for the measurement, by default it is drawings unit enum value DRAWING.
